001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
005
006/**
007 * A function with trainable parameters that can be estimated and updated.
008 * <p>
009 * Extends {@link EstimationFunction} by adding accessors and mutators for
010 * parameters (biases, weights, coefficients, etc.) used during training.
011 * Provides default convenience methods for reading, writing, and updating
012 * parameters.
013 */
014public interface TrainableFunction<N extends Number> extends EstimationFunction<N> {
015
016    /**
017     * Returns the number of trainable parameters of this function.
018     *
019     * @return the number of parameters
020     */
021    int getParameterCount();
022
023    /**
024     * Returns the underlying parameter vector for this function.
025     *
026     * @return the array of parameters
027     */
028    Array<N> getParameters();
029
030    /**
031     * Returns the parameter at the given index.
032     *
033     * @param p index of the parameter
034     * @return the parameter value
035     * @throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range
036     */
037    N getParameter(int p);
038
039    /**
040     * Replaces the parameter vector with the given values.
041     *
042     * @param values the new parameter values
043     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the array length does not match
044     *                                  {@link #getParameterCount()}
045     */
046    void setParameters(Array<N> values);
047
048    /**
049     * Sets the parameter at the given index to the specified value.
050     *
051     * @param p     index of the parameter
052     * @param value new value to set
053     * @throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range
054     */
055    void setParameter(int p, N value);
056
057    /**
058     * Adjusts all parameters (except the first one, typically the bias)
059     * by adding the corresponding deltas.
060     *
061     * @param deltas an array of additive updates, aligned with the parameter vector
062     */
063    default void adjustParameters(Array<N> deltas) {
064        for (int i = 0; i < deltas.length(); i++) {
065            adjustParameter(i, deltas.get(i));
066        }
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Adjusts a single parameter by adding the given delta to its current value.
071     *
072     * @param p     index of the parameter
073     * @param delta the increment to add to the parameter value
074     * @throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range
075     */
076    default void adjustParameter(int p, N delta) {
077        setParameter(p, getNumberTypeSupport().add(getParameter(p), delta));
078    }
079
080}
